item.description:
Route Summary:

Hingham, Scituate, Norwell Ride Loop Ride

The wind and cold means you have to dress right for the ride, i.e. windproof clothing and appropriate coverage (hands, feet, neck) and layers.

weather.com says, cloudy and mid 40's on sunday.

The route

http://goo.gl/maps/jvRQo

Some water views and a lighthouse.

Riders should plan to meet at 10:30 am and be ready to ride around 10:45 am.

We should return to the parking area around 2:00 pm if we can keep the 12 plus pace. Please be able to b/c the group needs to return on time to the parking area.

 

Starting Point:

Wompatuck State Park (Union St Entrance) http://goo.gl/maps/d5uBc

trail map if you want to explore ... they usually have printed ones there

http://friendsofwompatuck.org/Wompatuck_map.pdf

Parking area (left side) across from Visitor Center after Gate entrance


What's required
------------------------------------

Layers, thin liner hat which covers ears under helmet, windproof gloves, thick socks for bike shoes, windproof riding gear, and neckwarmer type face cover.

Bike helmets and road bikes / skinny tire hybrids in good repair
1 full water bottles
bring a snack


What's recommended:
------------------------------------
Spare tire, repair kit, sun screen, snacks, energy bars,  an extra layer, and a cell phone.


"Cue"gle sheet

 

http://files.meetup.com/482869/wompatuckHinghamScituateNorwellLoop.txt
item.how_to_find_us: Parking area across from visitor center on left side of union st after passing thru park gates
item.name: Hingham, Scituate, Norwell Ride
